title: Cheryl Hines Faces Backlash For Posting Clip Of Husband RFK Jr. Taking Shower
content: The video did not go down well with social media users who called out Cheryl Hines for being a 'grifter'.

title: "Genocidal Maniac": Author's Son After Biden Pictured With Father's Book
content: Ismail Khalidi, son of Columbia University professor emeritus Rashid Khalidi, has labelled US President Joe Biden a "genocidal maniac" after the latter was spotted holding a copy of his father's book, 'The Hundred Years' War on Palestine'.
summary: Ismail Khalidi, son of Columbia University professor emeritus Rashid Khalidi, has labelled US President Joe Biden a "genocidal maniac" after the latter was spotted holding a copy of his father's book, 'The Hundred Years' War on Palestine'.

title: Hindu Spiritual Leader's Arrest Being 'Misconstrued': Bangladesh To UN Forum
content: The arrest of a Hindu leader in Dhaka has been "misconstrued" and he was arrested on specific charges, Bangladesh has told a UN forum on minority issues, claiming that there has been no systematic attack on minorities in the country.
summary: The arrest of a Hindu leader in Dhaka has been "misconstrued" and he was arrested on specific charges, Bangladesh has told a UN forum on minority issues, claiming that there has been no systematic attack on minorities in the country.

title: World Central Kitchen Member Among 2 Aid Workers Killed In Gaza Airstrikes
content: Two aid workers were killed in Israeli airstrikes in Gaza on Saturday, with Israel saying it had killed an operative who took part in the October 7, 2023 Hamas attacks on Israel and who it said was employed by a US-based charity.
summary: Two aid workers were killed in Israeli airstrikes in Gaza on Saturday, with Israel saying it had killed an operative who took part in the October 7, 2023 Hamas attacks on Israel and who it said was employed by a US-based charity.

title: Taiwan President Gets 'Red Carpet' Welcome In US, China Reacts
content: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te was feted with a red carpet, garlands of flowers and "alohas" as he kicked off his two-day stopover in Hawaii on Saturday.
summary: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te was feted with a red carpet, garlands of flowers and "alohas" as he kicked off his two-day stopover in Hawaii on Saturday.

title: Old Video Of Trudeau Mocking Trump Viral As They Meet Amid Tariff Threat

title: Trump Taps Charles Kushner, Father Of His Son-In-Law, As Envoy To France
content: President-elect Donald Trump nominated Charles Kushner, the father of his son-in-law Jared Kushner, as the US ambassador to France, in the latest of several controversial picks.

title: SpaceX To Launch NASA's 'Dragonfly' To Saturn's Moon In 2028: What We Know
content: Elon Musk's SpaceX will launch NASA's groundbreaking Dragonfly mission to Saturn's largest moon, Titan, using a Falcon Heavy rocket.

title: Ancient Egyptians Drank Cocktails Of Psychedelic, Bodily Fluids And Alcohol
content: The research combined chemical and DNA analyses uncovered the first physical evidence of plants with psychotropic and medicinal properties in an Egyptian mug.

title: New York City Paying $220 Million To Pakistan-Owned Hotel; Vivek Ramaswamy Says...
content: The City of New York pays $220 million to rent a hotel owned by the Government of Pakistan to house illegal immigrants, a report claimed.

title: Gene-Edited Pig Kidney Keeps Monkey Alive For 6 Months In China

title: "Elon Musk Pushing Agenda...": Anthony Albanese Amid Under-16 Ban Criticism

title: "Go Find Another Sucker": Trump's Big Warning For India, China, Russia

title: "Turn To Love, Not...": Kate Middleton's Christmas Letter After Cancer Battle

title: Who Is Indian-American Kash Patel, Donald Trump's Pick To Head FBI
content: US President-elect Donald Trump nominated his loyalist Kashyap 'Kash' Patel to head the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) on Saturday. Making the announcement, the 78-year-old President-elect called Mr Patel an "America First fighter".

title: UK Man Wins Rs 215 Compensation After Finding 'Smooth' Mars Chocolate Bar
content: Harry Seager had contacted Mars Wrigley UK to ask whether the smooth chocolate bar was a new addition to its product line.
